bug.author: tensorflow2019
bug.summary: in the website "https://tensorflow.google.cn",the experience of auto-scroll is so bad for focusing on the content. I wish it could be improved.Tks
bug.description: in the website "<denchmark-link:https://tensorflow.google.cn%22,the>https://tensorflow.google.cn",the</denchmark-link> experience of auto-scroll is so bad for focusing on the content. I wish it could be improved. Thanks.

comments.comment:
Could we get more detail on this?
Browser and version? How are you invoking autoscroll? Which pages are causing issues?
No response; closing, but please re-file if you want to tell us about accessibility issues.
